snippet.title: Memetric: Final Lifeforms | Trailer #1 (FHD)
snippet.description:
SHORT: 
The game is a real time 2d strategy game set in the post-apocalyptic future.


SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:

These are the Memetric system requirements (minimum)

    Memory: 1 GB
    Graphics Card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 730
    CPU: Intel Dual Core
    DirectX: Version 9.1
    Memetric File Size: 639 MB
    OS: Windows 8.1

These are the Memetric system requirements (recommended)

    Memory: 4 GB
    Graphics Card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750
    CPU: Intel Core 2 Duo T7250
    DirectX: Version 10
    Memetric File Size: 639 MB
    OS: Windows 10

OTHER INFOS: 
The game contains a relatively long story, which the player can also shape with his decisions, which they can start at the very beginning with the choice of hero.
Furthermore, it is a real time strategy game, in sidescroller style, with multiple abilities and a passive development system that adapts to the player.

SOCIAL MEDIA PLATFORMS:
FatalCage facebook: https://www.facebook.com/FatalCageHungary
Memetric facebook: https://www.facebook.com/FatalCage.Memetric
FatalCage Twitter: https://twitter.com/CageFatal
Memetric Discord: https://discord.com/invite/ahj9pKY
